props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: hasIcon
props.docblock: Specifies whether to show an icon next to the text.

description.text: Specifies whether to show an icon next to the text.

props.name: type
props.docblock: Specifies feedback type, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies feedback type, this affects styling.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: Specifies icon to show, will only be shown if `hasIcon` prop is set to `true`.

description.text: Specifies icon to show, will only be shown if `hasIcon` prop is set to `true`.

props.name: muted
props.docblock: Specifies whether to show feedback with muted styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to show feedback with muted styling.
